title: mcmmo给某个用户组经验加成
author: 小烦

replies.author: Ghost__
replies.txt_content:
给予权限 mcmmo.perks.xp.倍数（要写英文）

2 double
 3 triple/treble
 4 quadruple
 5 quintuple pentadruple
 6 sextuple hexatruple
 7 septuple
 8 octuple
 9 nonuple
 10 decuple
 11 undecuple hendecuple
 12 duodecuple
 13 tredecuple
 100 centuple
